successes.title: Dwarven Forge's Game Tiles: Revolutionary Miniature Terrain
successes.description: Dwarven Forge's Game Tiles Kickstarter project seeks to bring revolutionary miniature terrain to everyone in the tabletop gaming world.

Pledges.description: WATCHER:  A big thank you from Dwarven Forge!
CONTRIBUTOR: Your DF Forum account will boast a special graphic that tells everyone that you are a Game Tiles backer.

GAMER:  Contributor Rewards + a special, logo’d Game Tiles Tote Bag.  Use your tote to haul your Game Tiles, or take your favorite games to your next get-together. Your $25 pledge includes free shipping ($10 value) within the US.  (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

1 SET (DUNGEON GRAY): Gamer Rewards + 1 Game Tiles set (14 straight walls, 12 floors, 6 corner walls, 2 swinging doors). These pieces come ready to use, infused (inside and out) with Dwarven Forge “Dark Dungeon Gray” color. You can also customize with your own dry brush color. See our video for an easy painting tutorial by Stefan. Your $65 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($15 value) within the USA.  (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

1 SET (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED): Gamer Rewards + 1 Game Tiles set (14 straight walls, 12 floors, 6 corner walls, 2 swinging doors) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors, similar to our classic Master Maze dungeon sets. Your $95 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($15 value) within the USA.  (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

2 SETS (DUNGEON GRAY): Gamer Rewards + 2 Game Tiles sets (28 straight walls, 24 floors, 12 corner walls, 4 swinging doors). These pieces come ready to use, infused (inside and out) with Dwarven Forge “Dark Dungeon Gray” color. You can also customize with your own dry brush color. Your $120 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($23 value) within the USA.   (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

2 SETS (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED): Gamer Rewards + 2 Game Tiles sets (28 straight walls, 24 floors, 12 corner walls, 4 swinging doors) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors, similar to our classic Master Maze dungeon sets. Your $170 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($23 value) within the USA.   (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

3 SETS (DUNGEON GRAY): Gamer Rewards + 3 Game Tiles sets (42 straight walls, 36 floors, 18 corner walls, 6 swinging doors). These pieces come ready to use, infused (inside and out) with Dwarven Forge “Dark Dungeon Gray” color. You can also customize with your own dry brush color. Your $175 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($30 value) within the USA.   (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

3 SETS (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED): Gamer Rewards + 3 Game Tiles sets (42 straight walls, 36 floors, 18 corner walls, 6 swinging doors) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors, similar to our classic Master Maze dungeon sets. Your $235 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($30 value) within the USA.   (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

5 SETS (DUNGEON GRAY): Gamer Rewards + 5 Game Tiles sets (70 straight walls, 60 floors, 30 corner walls, 10 swinging doors). These pieces come ready to use, infused (inside and out) with Dwarven Forge “Dark Dungeon Gray” color. You can also customize with your own dry brush color. Your $260 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($45 value) within the USA.   (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

5 SETS (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED): Gamer Rewards + 5 Game Tiles sets (70 straight walls, 60 floors, 30 corner walls, 10 swinging doors) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors, similar to our classic Master Maze dungeon sets. Your $380 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($45 value) within the USA.   (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

10 SETS (DUNGEON GRAY): Gamer Rewards + 10 Game Tiles sets (140 straight walls, 120 floors, 60 corner walls, 20 swinging doors). These pieces come ready to use, infused (inside and out) with Dwarven Forge “Dark Dungeon Gray” color. You can also customize with your own dry brush color. Your $500 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($90 value) within the USA. (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

10 SETS (EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED): Gamer Rewards +10 Game Tiles sets (140 straight walls, 120 floors, 60 corner walls, 20 swinging doors) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors, similar to our classic Master Maze dungeon sets. Your $730 pledge includes FREE shipping and handling ($90 value) within the USA. (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

PATRON:  Gamer Rewards +10 Game Tiles sets (140 straight walls, 120 floors, 60 corner walls, 20 swinging doors) EXPERTLY HAND PAINTED with the full palette of colors, similar to our classic Master Maze dungeon sets PLUS Within 3 weeks of the end of this KS campaign, you will be sent an expertly hand-painted Game Tiles prototype piece (either a Corner Wall or a Straight Wall). This piece will be hand-painted by Stefan Pokorny -- the founder and master sculptor of Dwarven Forge. Also, he will hand sign the bottom of the piece. (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

MASTER PATRON:  Patron Rewards + Signed Prototype Set: (Within 3 weeks of the end of this KS campaign, you will be sent a complete 34-piece AWESOMELY hand-painted Game Tiles prototype set (instead of just 1 piece from Patron Reward). This set will be hand-painted by Stefan Pokorny -- the founder and master sculptor of Dwarven Forge. Also, he will hand sign the bottom of each piece. These prototype sets (hand-painted by Stefan himself!) will be extremely rare -- and a must have for rabid DF collectors).   (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)

GRAND MASTER PATRON: Master Patron Rewards + D&D fun with Stefan: (Stefan Pokorny will run you (and up to 7 of your friends) through a D&D adventure -- plus Stefan will hang out with you over dinner to discuss all things Dwarven Forge. The session will include: Afternoon game session, DF Studio Tour, Dinner, Evening session, and after event drinks. Sessions and food/drink will take place in the basement of Tutu's bar/restaurant in Brooklyn, NY -- where Stefan runs all his games. This is your chance to game with a legend!  The Reward Level does not cover any travel or hotel, but Stefan will buy you (and up to 7 friends) dinner and drinks.   Must be redeemed by 12/15/13.   (International recipients are responsible for any applicable import fees.)
